title: What are some business tasks that can be automated by software? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not to trivialize the question, but everything can be automated to some degree. If you look hard enough and are willing to spend, you can find off-the-shelf software that will write certain kinds of articles, design certain kinds of products, schedule work and manage employees, support customer issues, handle payroll, and pretty much anything else you can imagine.  The questions are the degree it needs to be automated (often, we automate sub-tasks to enhance an employee's ability) and whether the benefits outweigh the costs.  Both depend on the business and their particular strengths and needs.

I agree with most of the answers. I will give you actual examples, but there are many more. Here are some of my examples: Pulling 20 variations of reports twice per month consolidating them in Google spreadsheets and email it to the team.Going through notifications daily in my LinkedIn and sending birthday messages to contacts who have birthday that day.Going through notifications daily in my LinkedIn and sending congrats messages to contacts who had new position.Sharing my Quora answers in a Facebook page and Facebook Group.Posting my Quora answers in my Blogger blogDownload attachment based on keywords in the subject of the email, and file email to my designated folder
